Description:
Serial Number I/24112021/AMO1 
Notice Number 312202123
Because You have failed to ensure that your employees' exposure to water-mix metalworking fluid mist, a substance hazardous to health, inhalation of which can cause asthma and occupational hypersensitivity pneumonitis, has been eliminated or adequately controlled as no local exhaust
ventilation is provided on your PROTURN RLX1630 CNC lathe. The machine is not fully enclosed allowing mist to be released into the workshop.


Serial Number I/24112021/AMO2 
Notice Number 312202470
Because You have failed to ensure that your employees' exposure to water-mix metalworking fluid mist, a substance hazardous to health, inhalation of which can cause asthma and occupational hypersensitivity pneumonitis, has been eliminated or adequately controlled as no local exhaust ventilation is provided on your PROTURN SLX 425 CNC lathe. The machine is not fully enclosed allowing mist to be released into the workshop
